name: Plugin Name: My YouTube Videos
author: Sebs Studio (Sebastien)

sections.description: Displays your latest uploaded videos from your YouTube account on a full page or in your sidebar using the widget.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the archive of the plugin.
  2. Upload folder my_youtube_videos to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Q1. Do I need to edit any files?

A1. No, just activate the plugin and it should work.

Q2. How do i display the my latest YouTube videos?

A2. Add this shortcode to either a post or page. [my_youtube_videos]

Q3. How do i change how many videos I want to display?

A3. Go to ‘Settings -> My YouTube Videos’ and select how many you want to show from the drop down menu.

Q4. How do i enable my videos to link straight to the HD version?

A4. Go to ‘Settings -> My YouTube Videos’ and select yes on ‘Enable HD’.

Q5. How do I add the widget in my side bar?

A5. Go to ‘Apprerance -> Widgets’ and find the widget called ‘My YouTube Videos’. Drag it to your side bar and select the options.

short_description: Displays your latest uploaded videos from your YouTube account on a full page or in your sidebar using the widget.
description: Displays your latest uploaded videos from your YouTube account on a full page or in your sidebar using the widget.
